page.title: 05TRADE: THE MARKET SQUARE
page.content: {Potton Market Square}is an attractive place for tourists. It is a small town. There is one{bank.}I like Potton Market Square because of the old buildings. In the square there are new flats called{Lions Court.}I would have liked Potton Market Square if the {Shambles}were there. The Shambles was in the middle of the square and used to contain a number of shops. It was pulled down when the building became unsafe and in a bad state of repair. There are eight food shops and there are fifteen non food shops. There is one{Post Office}and there is a{library in the middle of the square. On the Market Square there were many gardens but now there are none. Altogether there are 26 shops and there are four roads leading into the square. There are red bricks on the buildings.
